page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: There are no schools in the block, which is largely covered by the catch- ment area of Keevil Primary School and Clarendon Comprehensive, Trowbridge. Parental choice enables children to attend Seend school and Comps. in Melksham,Market Lavington and Devizes. At least 11 are educated at private schools at Potterne, Trowbridge and Bath. Trowbridge College provides for the l6+ students. 75% of the CofE con- trolled Keevil School's 61 pupils come from the block area, whilst the 3.20 staff live elsewhere. Owing to limited space, school makes regular use of the Village Hall and Playing Field. Noah's Ark was the School's PTA prizewinning float at the 1985 Trowbridge Carnival; the result of joint work by local families. Children 3-5yrs attend Play- groups in the area. An adult education class in yoga is held at Keevil Hall.
